turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, what can i do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order two large pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. what toppings did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking pepperoni and bacon on the first one. And bacon and sausage on the second one. Both of those with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so the order is for 2 large pizzas, 1 pepperoni and bacon, and 1 bacon and sausage, both with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i've submitted the order. it'll b ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else i can do for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that will be it for me. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome. you're welcome, have a great weekend.
